archimate:Assessment.name: Demonstrate we are constantly secure and compliant against laws, regulations and contracts
archimate:Assessment.documentation:
In order to have security in control, our CISO is responsible to ensure our compliancy against laws, regulations and customer contracts. In order to state whatever we have security in control, CISO will have to ensure that
1) We have a clear strategy how we enforce security in our company 2) Ensure we have guidelines, processes and responsibilitie on our development and operations 3) Ensure we have risk management process and visibility to our business risks 4) Ensure our staff is skilled and trained and working according to set policies and procedures 5) Report and communicate the status of our 'security' which is measured through various automatic mechanisms
To ensure growth, we need to assure we are following laws, regulations and standards to our customers
